snippet.title: Broken Ranks  - Open Beta trailer
snippet.description:
The trailer announcing the beginning of the Open Beta tests of Broken Ranks, the successor of the acclaimed Polish MMORPG - The Pride of Taern.

In this brutal world, filled with the clash of weapons and roars of powerful, dark creatures, many heroes fell and their names were cast into oblivion. Use your chance. Show your mettle and aid others in their quest for glory. Together with your friends, unite the broken ranks against your enemies in one of the most fascinating MMORPGs of this generation.

Official website: https://brokenranks.com

Visit our social medias:
https://www.facebook.com/BrokenRanks
https://www.facebook.com/WhitemoonGames
https://www.reddit.com/r/BrokenRanksOfficial
https://twitter.com/Whitemoon_Games
https://discord.gg/brokenranks
